summary: Dedicated cybersecurity professional with expertise in threat analysis, incident response, and security operations. Experienced in implementing security controls, conducting vulnerability assessments, and maintaining SOC operations to protect organizational assets against evolving cyber threats.

experience.title: Security Analyst
experience.description: Monitor security events, investigate incidents, and implement security controls
achievements: Reduced mean time to detection (MTTD) by 40% through enhanced SIEM rule optimization
Led incident response for 50+ security events with 100% containment success rate
Implemented automated threat hunting workflows reducing manual analysis time by 60%
Conducted quarterly vulnerability assessments identifying and remediating 200+ critical findings

experience.title: Junior Security Analyst
experience.description: Supported security operations and monitoring activities in a 24/7 SOC environment
achievements: Monitored security alerts and escalated 95% of critical incidents within SLA requirements
Assisted with digital forensics investigations for insider threat cases
Maintained security documentation and incident response playbooks
Achieved Security+ and CySA+ certifications during tenure

technical: Penetration Testing (Metasploit, Burp Suite, OWASP ZAP)

projects.name: SOC Automation Framework
projects.description: Developed Python-based automation scripts to streamline incident response workflows
achievements: Reduced incident response time by 50% through automated playbooks
Integrated multiple security tools for centralized alert management

projects.name: Threat Hunting Dashboard
projects.description: Built custom Splunk dashboard for proactive threat hunting and IOC tracking
achievements: Enabled proactive identification of advanced persistent threats
Provided real-time visibility into network anomalies and suspicious activities

projects.name: Vulnerability Management Program
projects.description: Designed and implemented comprehensive vulnerability assessment program
achievements: Established automated scanning schedules covering 100% of infrastructure
Reduced critical vulnerability exposure by 80% through prioritized remediation
